title: Technical Issue: Computer freezes after I've finished the game
body:
My computer keeps freezing after a certain number of games. It freezes with the End Game screen when I click continue. As a result I've had to restart my computer on multiple occasions.

When it freezes, I can't interact with any other application that is open, and I can't click anything.
I've tried Alt Tab, opening Task Manager, but nothing works.

I'm currently playing on an Asus Laptop with Windows 8.1 (64 bit)

replies.body:
I recommend repairing the LoL files by clicking the question mark help button before you log in and click repair (takes a long time).

Last resort would be to uninstall and re download LoL.

If your PC is freezing not just because of LoL, would be worth running a virus scan, a PC cleaner such as CrapCleaner, and as a last resort restore your PC to factory settings.
